Password should be between 8 to 16 characters Password did not match Session expired. Please login again. You are logged out Feature not available We need permissions for some feature to work smoothly Please restart the application Enter OTP Once You Receive It Please enter username and password Invalid Mobile Number/OTP Please continue with the rest of the forms by Login In with the phone number provided during sign up/registration. Could not get the location. Try again. Check farmer declaration checkbox Check officer declaration checkbox Select Gender Select land Unit Select State Pin number should be 6 digits Select Loan Amount Select Loan Purpose Age should be between 18 to 70 years Check at least one from Irrigation Facility Check at least one from Farm Equipments Check at least one from Livestock Check at least one from Rabi Crops Check at least one from Kharif Crops Check at least one from Summer Crops Plantation area must be less than the total farmland area Check at least one plantation crop Name in document did not match with the applicant name Failed to get the masked image. Try again Please upload the back side of aadhaar card Passport failed in validation. Name did not match. Passport failed in validation. Voter ID failed in validation. Name did not match Voter ID failed in validation Driving license failed in validation. Name did not match Driving license failed in validation Pan failed in validation. Name did not match. Pan failed in validation Invalid aadhar number Invalid pan number Invalid driving license number Invalid passport file number Invalid voter id number Keep your aadhaar with you and press OK to continue. Something went wrong. Could not validate Ifsc code should be of 11 characters Account No. should be greater than 6 characters Maximum 15 members allowed Pan available checkbox is checked. Please select Pan card as proof of identity DBT account number cannot be blank Select a document name Select loan type Select tenure Select ID proof document name Select Address proof document name Select land document name Please enter a valid Id Proof document number Please enter a valid Address Proof document number

Choose Language Home Settings Reset Password Logout Language Password Management Change Password Memory Management Clear Cache Invite A Friend About Farm Infinity (Farmer application management app) Version 1.7.1 Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Old Password New Password Confirm Password Recently Added Edit/Search Edit Preferences Send OTP & First Middle Last Resend OTP
Enter your first name Enter your middle name Enter your last name Enter dob from date picker Age Enter your father name Enter your phone number Enter your alternate phone number Enter your email id eg 10.0 eg 10.0 eg 10.0 Enter bank name Enter acc no.\ Enter no of family member Enter ifsc code Date Coordinates
Enter OTP Enter your registered Phone No Enter new password Confirm new password UPLOAD PHOTO Submit Save Open Camera Longitude: Latitude: OTP is valid for 10 minutes Verify Get Farmer Details Enter Farmer Officer
Open Camera Camera Pane Dropdown List GPS Calendar Logo
Easy and affordable financial services for farmers and agribusinesses apply now on "Farm Infinity" App. Link to the app is given below. Thank you. Have a nice day
APPLICATION ID FIRST NAME MIDDLE NAME LAST NAME DATE OF BIRTH AGE GENDER NAME OF FATHER IF MARRIED MENTION SPOUSE NAME PHONE NO. (as per bank records) ALT PHONE NO. EMAIL ADDRESS LINE 1 ADDRESS LINE 2 VILLAGE CITY/TOWN DISTRICT PIN STATE LOAN AMOUNT LOAN PURPOSE LOAN REMARKS GPS LOCATION Longitude/Latitude I have read the terms and conditions cited below, and declare that the information given by me is true to my knowledge.
Is Farmer member of FPO/FPC? FPO/FPC Name Check the checkbox if FPO/FPC is not on the list FPO/FPC Code No. of family members BANK DETAILS (For DBT) Account No. Bank Name IFSC CODE PASSBOOK PHOTO KCC SCHEME Do you hold KCC? Loan Type Account No. Bank Name IFSC CODE Tenure(in months) Annual Obligation INSURANCE SCHEME Do you have Crop/Livestock insurance? OTHER LOANS Did you avail any other loan? Loan Type Account No. Bank Name IFSC CODE Loan Amount Tenure(in months) Annual Obligation DOCUMENTS NEEDED Your colour passport size photograph PAN CARD(Available) Proof of Identity Proof of Address Land Document(Any) Do you want us to contact you?
Land Holding Total farmland, including plantation area in (select from the dropdown list.) Irrigation Facility Drip Irrigation River/Canal Nearby Hydroponics Sprinklers Rainfed Water Pumps Rain harvesting/Pond Solar Water Pumps Other Farm Equipments Harvester Seeder Plough-Cattle Driven Tractor Power Tiller Weeder Farm Storage Facilities available? Post Harvest Facilities available? Livestock Bull Calf Camel Cow Duck Goat Hen Horse/Mare/Mule Pig Rabbit Sheep Rabi Crops Cash Crop Cereals and Grains Oil Seeds Pulses Spices Vegetables Kharif Crops Summer Crops Plantation Crops Plantation Crop Plantation area (in acres) Plantation Fruit Medicinal Plant Exotic Crop Chemical Fertiliser Used(kgs/acre) Pesticide Used(kgs/acre) Organic Fertiliser Used(kgs/acre)
Yes No Enter in CAPITAL
https://farminfinity.com/privacy_policy1.html https://farminfinity.com/terms.html
By validating through OTP, the applicant declare the information entered in the application of this platform is true to his/her knowledge. Also acknowledged by the applicant that submission of the application, Farm Infinity does not guarantee disbursement/sanction of any kind of loan or other financial products to him/her. Farm infinity is not responsible for any dispute arising of incorrect/fraudulent information provided
I agree that the information filled in this platform correct to the best of my knowledge. I hereby declare that I have not altered or manipulated any information while submitting this application.
I agree that the information filled in this platform is as given by the applicant and is correct to the best of my knowledge. I hereby declare that I have not altered or manipulated any information while submitting this application.
I, %1$s, aged (Age), years, son/daughter of (Name of Father) a resident of (Full Residential Address) in the district of (District Name), (State Name), do hereby declare that the information provided hereinabove and in the documents appended herewith is true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief and nothing has been falsely stated or concealed therein. I understand that if the said information as given by me is proved to be false, then I will have to face punishment as per any provision of Law for the time being in force as well as the benefit availed of by me or the benefit accrued to me shall be summarily canceled.
I, %1$s, aged (Age), years, son/daughter of (Name of Father) a resident of (Full Residential Address) in the district of (District Name), (State Name), Employee of Farm Infinity, Employee ID (ID) do hereby declare that the information collected hereinabove and in the documents appended herewith is true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief and nothing has been falsely stated or concealed therein. I understand that if the said information as given by me is proved to be false, then I will have to face punishment as per any provision of Law for the time being in force as well as the benefit availed of by me or the benefit accrued to me shall be summarily canceled.
